description: This file defines an interface (ILocalStore) for a local storage component, specifying methods for opening storage, creating tables, setting limits, counting entries, retrieving entries, removing entries, and adding entries. It also defines a shared pointer type alias for this interface.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: An interface for local storage operations, including methods for managing tables and entries within a storage system.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens the storage at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the storage.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a specified table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries within a range in a specified table.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves a list of entries starting from a given offset.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries in a specified range within a table.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a specified table.
